channel.title: Simple questions
channel.description:
1.fix colour whip with stats 2.need to add keep items on death 3.hand cannon/sol/b gloves/void bottems (dont wear) needs to be coded... 4.need to fix falador/monastery and fix 95%/100% of the wildy line in front of the monastry. 5.fix commands work for all players master,lvl,info,pvp,commands ect. they only work for admin+ 6.need to fix npc (hit 100 and they die) 7.need to add lobby 8.delete npc at home 9.chaotics stat/atts 10.primal stats/att also 11.need runes to cast spells 12.make bank booths work 13.fix char opens it up and doesnt let you confirm 14. fix female/male doesnt switch to male if your a female
Thanks as most as i can think of since i gtg so if you know how to change any just pm me or put the number then say -thanks using new 614 source in server downloads
